name: Dirty Room
description:
Background:


One day you received a letter from your old friend who invited you to visit him.

As a detective C you will begin an unexpected journey.

Can you survive and overcome challenges ahead?

Game features:


- First person shooter adventure.

- Exploration.

- Different main themes for each chapter.

- Skill tree system for character development.

** More contents are under development.
Only support Xbox controller
